lines.line: Life knocked me down, just like it knocked you down too.
I watched my dreams burn away in an instant.
Alone with my thoughts as the rain fell outside.
I hid from the world, afraid to face another day.
But then I remembered who I really am.
I started small, testing my strength.
I pushed myself beyond comfort zones.
I took bold action when opportunity appeared.
I ran from the flames of my past.
I found joy in the simple things again.
I moved forward with powerful strides.
I showed the world my true strength.
Now I reach for what I want without hesitation.
I embrace the support of those who lift me up.
Remember: Your setbacks don't define your comeback story.

parsed_script.full_script: Life knocked me down, just like it knocked you down too. I watched my dreams burn away in an instant. Alone with my thoughts as the rain fell outside. I hid from the world, afraid to face another day. But then I remembered who I really am. I started small, testing my strength. I pushed myself beyond comfort zones. I took bold action when opportunity appeared. I ran from the flames of my past. I found joy in the simple things again. I moved forward with powerful strides. I showed the world my true strength. Now I reach for what I want without hesitation. I embrace the support of those who lift me up. Remember: Your setbacks don't define your comeback story.
